name: Saria - Natural Soap
description:
Saria - handmade soap scented with natural essential oils.

An uplifting blend of cold pressed blood orange, black pepper, amyris, garden spearmint, clove bud and more.  A delightful and radiant soap with a refreshing silky lather.  Quite suitable for the adventurous woman and definitely one of my favorites! 

Ingredients:  annatto infused olive oil, palm oil, distilled water, coconut oil, sodium hydroxide, shea butter, mango butter, essential oils, apricot kernel oil, castor oil, oat powder, calendula powder, kaolin clay, tussah silk

You will receive 1 bar of Saria handmade natural soap.

Available for US shipments only.

name: Lime Vetiver - Natural Soap
description:
Lime Vetiver Soap - Naturally scented with fine essential oils.

An in house blend of essentials oils consisting of fragrant crushed key limes with a light floral heart of may chang & rose geranium in a base of grounding Haitian vetiver - drops of dark aged patchouli.  Avocado oil and french green clay gives this soap bar a creamy, silky lather.  Suitably unisex.

Ingredients:  olive oil, palm oil, distilled water, coconut oil, sodium hydroxide, essential oils, shea butter, mango butter, avocado oil, french green clay, castor oil, oxide, tussah silk


You will receive 1 bar of Lime Vetiver natural soap.

Available for US shipments only.

name: Lemongrass Ylang - Natural Soap
description:
Lemongrass Ylang - A natural soap scented with a simple, yet elegant blend of essential oils.

A fresh blast of lemongrass wrapped in a floral heart of ylang ylang and may chang with drops of dark aged patchouli.  Gentle oils of olive and apricot kernel, with added pink clay and poppy seeds strewn throughout, gives this bar a feminine appeal.

Ingredients:  olive oil, palm oil, distilled water, coconut oil, sodium hydroxide, shea butter, mango butter, essential oils, apricot kernel oil, castor oil, pink kaolin clay, oat powder, poppy seeds, tussah silk

You will receive 1 bar of Lemongrass Ylang handmade natural soap.


Available for US shipments only.
